text: innum (islam markkattirkut) tinkilaikkavum, kuhprukku (nirakarippukku) utavi ceyyavum, muhminkalitaiye pilavu untupannavum, allahvukkum avanutaiya tutarukkum virotamayp porpurintavarkalukku pukalitamakavum akka oru masjitai munnar niruviyavarkal; "nankal nallataiye yanri (veronrum) virumpavillai" enru niccayamakac cattiyam ceyvarkal - anal avarkal niccayamakap poyyarkal enpatarku allahve catciyam kurukiran
